author: joakime
msg: * Adding ability to download sources, javadoc, and client jars too.
* Adding ActiveManagedRepositories class to aide in anonymous artifact handling.
* Adding test-repository for maven 2.x j2ee artifacts with sources / javadoc / client jars.
* Adding ManagedArtifact class to track this relationship between main artifact and attached artifacts.

author: jonesde
msg: Added missing license header from new file added from OFBIZ-644; also remove the superfluous properties file and change the code to not use it; see additional comments on OFBIZ-644

author: mturyn
msg: Fixed child listbox's extent dominating combobox's, now order of priority is (say) combobos.height, listbox.height, default.
Combobox widths and heights settable with a percentage (except for heights under IE, which are unsettable.).

author: rickhall
msg: Applied patch (FELIX-201) to add support for Java 1.6.0 to the main
launcher and to the felix launcher plugin.

author: jonesde
msg: This is a fix from a recent patch from Anil Patel that I missed in the main commit; fixes a bug from earlier work
